text: Rhinella (Beaked Toads or Rio Viejo Toads) is a subgenus of Bufo. Some people call it its own genus. It has 71 species of true toads. They live in Central and South America. ==Species== Note: Species below are shown as species of Rhinella. They are treated as species of Bufo by many authors.
